trans-unit.source: Make your everyday life easier, handle mail alerts about stock and orders, addressed to you as well as your customers.
trans-unit.target: Make your everyday life easier, handle mail alerts about stock and orders, addressed to you as well as your customers.

trans-unit.source: Please type one (or more) email address for the new order notification
trans-unit.target: Please type one (or more) email address for the new order notification

trans-unit.note: Line: 298 Comment: Add error message and remove it

trans-unit.source: Please type one (or more) email address for the out of stock notifications
trans-unit.target: Please type one (or more) email address for the out of stock notifications

trans-unit.source: Cannot update out of stock emails
trans-unit.target: Cannot update out of stock emails

trans-unit.source: Please type one (or more) email address for return slip notifications
trans-unit.target: Please type one (or more) email address for return slip notifications

trans-unit.source: Give the customer the option of receiving a notification when an out of stock product is available again.
trans-unit.target: Give the customer the option of receiving a notification when an out of stock product is available again.

trans-unit.source: Send a notification to the customer when an order is edited.
trans-unit.target: Send a notification to the customer when an order is edited.

trans-unit.source: Receive a notification when an order is placed.
trans-unit.target: Receive a notification when an order is placed.

trans-unit.source: Write one or more e-mail, use 'Return' or comma to separate each e-mail
trans-unit.target: Write one or more e-mail, use 'Return' or comma to separate each e-mail

trans-unit.source: Receive a notification if the available quantity of a product is below the following threshold.
trans-unit.target: Receive a notification if the available quantity of a product is below the following threshold.

trans-unit.source: Quantity for which a product is considered out of stock.
trans-unit.target: Quantity for which a product is considered out of stock.

trans-unit.source: Receive a notification when a product has insufficient coverage.
trans-unit.target: Receive a notification when a product has insufficient coverage.

trans-unit.source: Stock coverage, in days. Also, the stock coverage of a given product will be calculated based on this number.
trans-unit.target: Stock coverage, in days. Also, the stock coverage of a given product will be calculated based on this number.

trans-unit.source: Receive a notification when a customer requests a merchandise return.
trans-unit.target: Receive a notification when a customer requests a merchandise return.

trans-unit.source: Mail alert: Unable to delete customer using email.
trans-unit.target: Mail alert: Unable to delete customer using email.

trans-unit.source: Mail alert: Unable to export customer using email.
trans-unit.target: Mail alert: Unable to export customer using email.
